name: MyListing Elementor Toolkit
author: YellowWave

sections.description:
This plugin adds Elementor related functionality to the MyListing theme. The plugin is under constant development, it is very likely that more features will be added in the coming weeks.

This plugin requires Elementor Pro and MyListing theme

Features

  • Design the single listing page using Elementor
  • Set different Elementor Header for Listing pages

Tutorial

Free vs Pro

The most essential/basic features are included in the free version. If you want more control over the fields & layout options, consider buying the Pro version.

By buying the pro version, you help me, Christiaan, the developer, keep this free plugin running and stay active expanding & improving the MyListing theme.

Find the PRO version here

Theme locations
[FREE] Single listing page
[PRO] Preview / index cards
[PRO] Quick view popup

Elementor Dynamic Tags
[FREE] Text
[FREE] Image
[FREE] Rating
[PRO] Gallery
[PRO] Date / recurring date
[PRO] Work hours

Elementor Widgets

[FREE] Related Listing (Host)
[PRO] Related Listings (multiple cards)
[PRO] Bookmark / quick view
[PRO] Quick actions
[PRO] Taxonomy / terms with MyListing icon
[PRO] Map / Location
[PRO] Work hours
[PRO] Upcoming dates
more will be added…

Display conditions
[FREE] Listing Type
sections.changelog:
1.0.17

  • Fix deprecations
  • Update Tested up to

1.0.16

  • Fix some deprecations

1.0.15

  • Check if MyListing theme is active.

1.0.14

  • NEW: Review count (number of reviews) dynamic tag
  • FIX: Up to 50 listing types are shown in selection

1.0.13

  • Separate WP Editor field with better support for html, fixes formatting issues.

1.0.12

  • Number tag: Fallback fix
  • Add word limit to regular field

1.0.11

  • Cast number to float in dynamic tag

1.0.10

  • Fix for job_description field.

1.0.9

  • Fix for the image ID in Elementor dynamic tag

1.0.8

  • Related Listing – Host fix for related listing not displaying.

1.0.7

  • Image resize fix

1.0.6

  • Fix for image dynamic tag.

1.0.5

  • Account navigation (woocommerce style)

1.0.4

  • Description did not probably insert newlines, this has been fixed.

1.0.3

  • Bugfixes

1.0.2

  • Related listing renamed to Related Listing (Host)

1.0.1

  • Bugfixes

1.0.0

  • Initial release of the plugin.

short_description: A simple Elementor addon that adds elementor functionality to parts of the My Listing theme.
